sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
wide
, je od ene do druge strani tistega velika razdalja.

seg.quote: She looked across the wide, flat meadow.
‘That's all right,’ she said, smiling widely.

sense.def:
Izraz
wide
uporabljamo v vprašanjih in trditvah o tem, koliko nekaj meri od ene strani ali roba do drugega.

seg.quote: The bay is about six miles wide.

sense.def:
To open or spread something wide
pomeni nekaj odpreti ali razprostreti do skrajne mere.

seg.quote: Rudolph always opened the window wide at night.
He left his office door wide open.

sense.def:
Kadar so naše oči
wide
ali
wide open
, so bolj odprte kot navadno, ker smo presenečeni ali preplašeni.

seg.quote: She sat looking up at me, her eyes wide with pleasure.

sense.def:
Raznolikost, razpon ali izbira, ki je
wide
, vsebuje veliko različnih stvari.

seg.quote: The college library had a wide variety of books.
Over the next twelve years, he travelled widely.

sense.def:
Izraz
wide
uporabimo tudi, kadar opisujemo nekaj, kar številni ljudje verjamejo ali poznajo.

seg.quote: The event received wide publicity in the press.
Your views on education are already widely known.

sense.def:
Kadar je razlika ali vrzel med dvema predmetoma
wide
, je velika.

seg.quote: The gap between the poor and the rich is very wide indeed.
Customs vary widely from one area to another.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
wide
opišemo nekaj, kar se nanaša na najpomembnejše ali splošne dele nekega položaja.

Strel ali udarec, ki je
wide
, ne zadene tarče.
